title: As a freshman majoring in material science and technology in college, what books should I read to comprehend the basics and improve my qualifications in this field? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey…its good you choose material science it has good scope in future. Basic books you should go through are O P KHANNA text book for material science and metallurgy and MATERIAL SCIENC AND ENGINEERING by CALLISTERS. these books cover whole basic knowledge for material science.

It all depends on the kind of specialization you would like to go for later in the course. For a very general description a few good books come to mind: Understanding materials scienceMaterials Science and engineering: An introduction (Callister)Materials handbook (Cardarelli)I hope this helps.
